Indian Economy.title: Around $30-35 billion of India’s merchandise exports to America at risk from Trump’s tariffs, says UBS Chief India Economist
Indian Economy.summary: According to UBS’ Chief India Economist Tanvee Gupta Jain, India may not lose much if it shifts away from cheaper Russian oil as the annual savings right now is only $2 billion

Indian Economy.title: Chhattisgarh’s latest scheme aims to get stray cattle off the roads
Indian Economy.summary: The Indian Express reported last year that 404 people had died and 129 were seriously injured after the vehicles they were travelling in crashed into animals, mostly cattle, in Chhattisgarh over a period of five and a half years.

Indian Economy.title: With new airport terminal, Maldives eyes more visitors
Indian Economy.summary: As the island nation tries stabilising its debt-burdened economy, it has pinned its hopes on increased tourist arrivals

Indian Economy.title: Ram Madhav writes: Countering Trump’s transactionalism
Indian Economy.summary: He understands that India is an indispensable ally in achieving three of his main goals

Stock Market.summary: DSP Nifty500 Flexicap Quality 30 Index Fund is a low-cost, rules-based flexicap product tracking Nifty500 Flexicap Quality 30 index.

Banking & Finance.title: ICICI Bank steeply raises minimum monthly average balance requirement for new Savings Bank customers
Banking & Finance.summary: The minimum MAB for new depositors with India’s second largest bank in metro, urban and semi-urban locations has risen to ₹50,000 (from ₹10,000 earlier) and ₹ 25,000 (from ₹5,000), respectively

Banking & Finance.title: Bank holiday today: Are banks open or closed on Saturday, August 9 for Raksha Bandhan 2025? Check region-wise list here
Banking & Finance.summary: Bank holiday today: Banks are closed on August 9, 2025, for Raksha Bandhan and typically on second and fourth Saturdays, as per the RBI holiday calendar.

Banking & Finance.title: Indian Bank’s financial inclusion programme helps in re-KYC of over 350 people at Tiruvallur district
Banking & Finance.summary: The camp was primarily focused on Re-KYC in the PMJDY accounts and enrollment of customers under flagship inclusion schemes such as PMJJBY and PMSBY

Banking & Finance.title: AU Small Finance Bank has to fulfil one precondition to become universal lender
Banking & Finance.summary: AU Small Finance Bank has received in-principle approval from RBI to become a universal lender. In the next 18 months, it must change its company structure to comply with regulatory requirements.

Technology Sector.title: Indian billionaire Harsh Goenka hails Satya Nadella’s reply to Elon Musk’s jab as ‘masterclass’: ‘Never mess with an Indian’
Technology Sector.summary: The back-and-forth began on Thursday, when Tesla and SpaceX chief Elon Musk took a swipe at Nadella on X, saying, “OpenAI is going to eat Microsoft alive.”

Technology Sector.title: Telangana snooping: Day after BRS lost power, ‘CCTVs switched off for 1 hour, snooping hard disks destroyed’
Technology Sector.summary: As reported by The Indian Express, the state police is currently probing allegations that five top police and intelligence officers and a TV channel operator indulged in illegal surveillance of 600 individuals to benefit the BRS.
